info.name: Sqordia API - Local Development
info.description: Complete API collection for Sqordia LOCAL DEVELOPMENT environment. Base URL: http://localhost:5241. All endpoints use API version v1. Questionnaire endpoints support bilingual (French/English) responses.

request.description: Check if the API is running and healthy
Seed the database with initial data (roles, permissions, admin user)
Check if database has been seeded
Get database configuration and connection details
Register a new user. UserType: Entrepreneur, OBNL, or Consultant
Login with admin credentials
Login with custom credentials
Authenticate with Google OAuth. Use Google ID token and access token from Google Sign-In.
Link a Google account to an existing local user account.
Unlink Google account from the current user account.
Get QR code and secret key for 2FA setup
Verify and enable 2FA with code from authenticator app
Get comprehensive system overview and key metrics
Get paginated list of users with filtering options
Get all business plans for the current user across all organizations they are a member of
Get all available business plan types with descriptions and characteristics

query.description: Include structured sections in the response

request.description: Get business plan with structured sections data

header.description: fr or en for bilingual support. Returns questions in French or English based on this header.

request.description: Get all questions for a business plan. Automatically loads the appropriate questionnaire template based on plan type (BusinessPlan, StrategicPlan, LeanCanvas). Supports bilingual responses (French/English) via Accept-Language header. For StrategicPlan, returns 20 questions organized into 5 sections.

header.description: fr or en for bilingual support

body.raw:
{
  "questionTemplateId": "{{question_id}}",
  "responseText": "Our mission is to promote social and economic integration of newcomers through comprehensive support services and community programs.",
  "numericValue": null,
  "dateValue": null,
  "booleanValue": null,
  "selectedOptions": null
}

request.description: Submit or update a response to a questionnaire question. For StrategicPlan questions (LongText type), only responseText is required. The system automatically tracks completion percentage.

header.description: fr or en for bilingual support

request.description: Get all responses for a business plan questionnaire. Returns all questions with their responses (if answered). Questions are ordered by their order field.

body.raw:
{
  "questionText": "How would you describe the main mission of your organization?",
  "planType": "StrategicPlan",
  "existingResponse": null,
  "organizationContext": "Non-profit organization focused on community development",
  "suggestionCount": 3,
  "language": "en"
}

request.description: Generate AI suggestions for answering a questionnaire question. Supports both French and English questions. For StrategicPlan questions, provides context-aware suggestions based on the organization type. Requires AI service to be configured and available.

header.description: fr or en for bilingual support

request.description: Get detailed progress information for a business plan questionnaire including completion percentage, answered/unanswered questions, time estimates, and milestones. For StrategicPlan, tracks progress through 20 questions across 5 sections.
Get all sections for a business plan with content and metadata
Get a specific section of a business plan

body.raw:
{
  "content": "Updated executive summary content with new information about our market position and competitive advantages.",
  "isAIGenerated": false,
  "isManualEdit": true,
  "status": "review",
  "tags": ["updated", "review"],
  "notes": "Updated based on stakeholder feedback"
}

request.description: Update a specific section of a business plan

body.raw:
{
  "currentContent": "Notre entreprise fournit des solutions innovantes pour les petites entreprises. Nous avons une équipe expérimentée et des produits de qualité.",

  "targetAudience": "investisseurs",
  "industryContext": "Startup technologique",

  "maxLength": 2000
}

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Question Suggestions - Business Plan",
  "description": "Generates AI suggestions for business plan questionnaire questions",
  "category": "QuestionSuggestions",
  "planType": "BusinessPlan",
  "language": "fr",
  "systemPrompt": "Vous êtes un expert consultant en affaires aidant les utilisateurs à répondre aux questions de questionnaire pour la création de plans d'affaires. Votre tâche est de générer des suggestions utiles, pertinentes et professionnelles.",
  "userPromptTemplate": "Question: {questionText}\n\nContexte: {organizationContext}\n\nVeuillez générer {suggestionCount} suggestions différentes pour répondre à cette question.",
  "variables": "{\"questionText\": \"The question to answer\", \"organizationContext\": \"Organization context\", \"suggestionCount\": \"Number of suggestions\"}",
  "notes": "Optimized for French business plan questions"
}
